Modules.Description: Areas of any type, such as geographic, jurisdictional or project

Modules.Description: Describes the rights you have to data and information

Modules.Description: Summarize cost information from your accounting systems

Modules.Description: Outline fee schedules for functions and services

Modules.Name: Source Documents and Bibliographies
Modules.Description: Bibliographic reference for source documents

Modules.Name: Equipment
Modules.Description: Describes equipment used in the field, lab or office

Modules.Description: Geographic and cartographic spatial reference systems

Modules.Name: Business Associates
Modules.Description: Companies, people or organizations you do business with

Modules.Name: Products and Substances
Modules.Description: Composition of hydrocarbons and other substances

Modules.Name: Projects
Modules.Description: Capture and track task lists for operational activities

Modules.Name: Work Orders and Requests
Modules.Description: Tracks work orders that support business operations

Modules.Name: Data Management
Modules.Description: Business rules, mappings, audit histories, QC history, metrics and more

Modules.Name: Unit of Measure
Modules.Description: Supports measured values in PPDM and conversions between unit systems

Modules.Name: Volume Conversions
Modules.Description: Hydrocarbon volumes by temperature and pressure regimes

Modules.Name: Reference Table Management
Modules.Description: Reference tables and lookup values used across the system

Modules.Name: Ecozones and Environments
Modules.Description: Paleontological ecozones or environment definitions

Modules.Name: Lithology
Modules.Description: Lithologic characteristics from rock analysis, such as color, porosity, grain size, etc.

Modules.Name: Paleontology
Modules.Description: Results of a paleontological study of fossils found in lithologic samples

Modules.Description: Information about fossils identified during study, and implications about biostratigraphic units

Modules.Name: Fossils
Modules.Description: Describes fossils and their discovery during analysis

Modules.Description: Sample collection, preparation and usage summaries

Modules.Name: Sample Analysis
Modules.Description: Sample preparation and results such as geochemistry, water, oil and gas analysis

Modules.Name: Fields
Modules.Description: Summary information about fields

Modules.Name: Pools
Modules.Description: Summary information about geologic or regulatory pools

Modules.Description: A scaled-down land reporting subject suitable for production reporting

Modules.Name: Production Reporting
Modules.Description: Volumes reporting for all products, time periods, activities or methods

Modules.Name: Spacing Units

Modules.Description: Aggregated reporting, such as production reporting or reserves forecasts

Modules.Description: Summarizes reserves information, including forecasts

Modules.Description: Requests to obtain authorization to do work or complete an operation

Modules.Description: Non-regulatory agreements between parties to conduct operations

Modules.Name: Consultations & Negotiations
Modules.Description: Discussions between various parties

Modules.Name: Contests and Disputes
Modules.Description: Summary information about legal disputes and their outcomes

Modules.Name: Notifications

Modules.Name: Stratigraphy

Modules.Description: Legal documents that govern operations

Modules.Name: Instruments
Modules.Description: Documents that physically document an interest or describe a legal entity

Modules.Description: Partnerships and division of interests

Modules.Name: Restrictions
Modules.Description: Environmental or operational limitations on operations
